argumentText:
ARGUMENT
n x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | tgpmulg.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` G ) |
| 2 |  | tgpmulg.t | |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) |
| 3 |  | #P_zex | |- ZZ e. _V |
| 4 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> ZZ e. _V ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 6 | 1, 5 | #P_tgptopon | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> J e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` G ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_topontop | |- ( J e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` G ) ) -> J e. Top ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> J e. Top ) |
| 9 | 5, 2 | #P_mulgfn | |- .x. Fn ( ZZ X. ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_a1i | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> .x. Fn ( ZZ X. ( Base ` G ) ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 5 | #P_tgpmulg | |- ( ( G e. TopGrp /\ n e. ZZ ) -> ( x e. ( Base ` G ) |-> ( n .x. x ) ) e. ( J Cn J ) ) |
| 12 | 4, 6, 8, 10, 11 | #P_txdis1cn | |- ( G e. TopGrp -> .x. e. ( ( ~P ZZ tX J ) Cn J ) ) |
